Text: *stare*...

Um, Eta, our main objective is actually to search for
oil fields—
...*scoot*

(How did she move so quickly without making any
sound?! Wait, is Eta able to move like Zeta?)
...*scoot, scoot, scoot*
No sense of magic detected from Malak...
(...She's silently riding on the slime!?)

(I see... Incredible! That's how she's remaining
silent! And she's simultaneously probing her
opponent's perceptive abilities.)
...Hold on, Eta, don't get your priorities mixed up!

Even if we're up against a dragon, if it isn't
attacking us, we can just leave it alone—
...There we go.
(She's made the slime mimic a boulder?)
...*scoot, scoot*...

(Eta's hiding behind that rock and moving alongside
it?! Malak ought to notice something so obvious—)
(It hasn't noticed at all?!)
Malak's senses seem to be pretty...dull?
(...I wonder if it's not as violent as we thought...)
...I've observed it briefly.
So...how was it?

Its intelligence appears low. Its instincts also seem
slow. I can't say for sure yet, but...

Its skin appears incredibly tough. Its fangs and
claws look extremely sharp. It also seems powerful.
In that sense, it's very much dragon-like.
I-I see...

Okay, Gamma, why don't you teeter right up to it and
try attacking while it's distracted?
O-Okay, got it—

Wait! That's crazy! Why should I approach it without
any defense?!
Danger is inevitable in the search for knowledge.

Aren't we supposed to be searching for oil right
now?!

But ultimately...if we want a place to drill...
it would be the area with the lowest elevation...

In other words, where that Malak is. So either way...
we need to get it to move.
Ulp... Makes sense!

...If I can defeat it, I will. If it seems difficult,
I'll lure it away... Fine?

Sure. If you manage to lure it away, I'll make sure
to retrieve your remains.

Don't make it sound like I'm some kind of sacrificial
lamb!
Seriously, why do I have to do this—
If you defeat it, Gamma...you'll be a Dragon Slayer.
Dragon Slayer?!

Out of the Shadow Garden, Master Shadow's currently
the only one. If all goes well, you'll be the second.
W-Whoa!
You've got this...
I'll do my best!

It doesn't even react...when I stand right in front
of it... It's not asleep, is it?

In any case, the target is so big there's no way
I can miss it!

I'll imbue my attacks with lots of magic and
strike!
When I strike, I'll give a forceful "swish"!
Swish, swish, swish, swish, swiiiiish!!!
...Huuuhhh?! It's not working at all!
Graaaarrrghhh!!!
Ooof! Owww?!
Hey, th-that was intense! Its attacks are lethal!

It usually doesn't move an inch from its territory...
but once you touch it, it instantly goes berserk...
Gyaaaaaaarrrghhhh!!!

Even its movements are agile! I can't handle it
anymore!
I guess it doesn't speak like the Mist Dragon...
Let's continue observing it... Good luck, Gamma...
C'mon, Etaaaa!
